## RecordToMapFactoryType type

Convert `Record<T, U>` into `Map<T, U>` utility.

When we want to convert a Record hash-map into an ECMAScript2015 Map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RecordToMapFactoryType<
  T = string | number,
  U = string | number
> = (input: Record<T, U>) => Map<T, U>
```
